summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5526 for the improvement of Avanon Way, from 35th Avenue Southwest to West Andover Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 70798, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
